name: Social Justice Pirates
description:
WARNING: This game may ruin video games...but probably not. It's actually kinda fun. Here are the following ways in which this game ruins games.

  • This game minority characters with agency.
  • This game is about game developers with social lives.
  • This game is about "social justice warriors".
  • This game doesn't let you jump, shoot, or be killed.
  • It's slightly educational.
